00030 #if !defined(_SPANDSP_BITSTREAM_H_)
00031 #define _SPANDSP_BITSTREAM_H_

00033 /*! \page bitstream_page Bitstream composition and decomposition
00034 \section bitstream_page_sec_1 What does it do?
00035 
00036 \section bitstream_page_sec_2 How does it work?
00037 */
00038 
00039 /*! Bitstream handler state */
00040 typedef struct bitstream_state_s bitstream_state_t;
00041 
00042 #if defined(__cplusplus)
00043 extern "C"
00044 {
00045 #endif
00046 
00047 /*! \brief Put a chunk of bits into the output buffer.
00048     \param s A pointer to the bitstream context.
00049     \param c A pointer to the bitstream output buffer.
00050     \param value The value to be pushed into the output buffer.
00051     \param bits The number of bits of value to be pushed. 1 to 25 bits is valid. */
00052 SPAN_DECLARE(void) bitstream_put(bitstream_state_t *s, uint8_t **c, uint32_t value, int bits);
00053 
00054 /*! \brief Get a chunk of bits from the input buffer.
00055     \param s A pointer to the bitstream context.
00056     \param c A pointer to the bitstream input buffer.
00057     \param bits The number of bits of value to be grabbed. 1 to 25 bits is valid.
00058     \return The value retrieved from the input buffer. */
00059 SPAN_DECLARE(uint32_t) bitstream_get(bitstream_state_t *s, const uint8_t **c, int bits);
00060 
00061 /*! \brief Flush any residual bit to the output buffer.
00062     \param s A pointer to the bitstream context.
00063     \param c A pointer to the bitstream output buffer. */
00064 SPAN_DECLARE(void) bitstream_flush(bitstream_state_t *s, uint8_t **c);
00065 
00066 /*! \brief Initialise a bitstream context.
00067     \param s A pointer to the bitstream context.
00068     \param lsb_first TRUE if the bit stream is LSB first, else its MSB first.
00069     \return A pointer to the bitstream context. */
00070 SPAN_DECLARE(bitstream_state_t *) bitstream_init(bitstream_state_t *s, int direction);
00071 
00072 SPAN_DECLARE(int) bitstream_release(bitstream_state_t *s);
00073 
00074 SPAN_DECLARE(int) bitstream_free(bitstream_state_t *s);
00075 
00076 #if defined(__cplusplus)
00077 }
00078 #endif
00079 
00080 #endif
